segments.text: We are on our way . I think our first stop is Buckingham Palace .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . I can already see the Palace Garden on the left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And here is Buckingham Palace ! Look , isn't it beautiful ? It is much bigger than I imagined .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The bus is turning right to Buckingham Gate . And now we are joining Victoria Street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes we are going towards Westminster Abbey . I can see it now ! Look to your right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can see it . The bus is stopping . I think we will be able to go inside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is amazing . I'm glad we decided to take this bus tour . So where next ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess we should see Big Ben soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It is just round the corner . Oh , can you see the London Eye ? Look straight and to your right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at this bridge . We will soon be crossing the Thames .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is Lambeth Bridge . We will then loop back and cross the river again on Westminster Bridge .
segments.speaker: S1
